hero.title:
Pitch deck creation
& training
hero.description: A compelling pitch deck is non-negotiable when fundraising. It's a chance to stand out, and the key to securing investor interest. Yet, many founders struggle to craft a deck that is clear, concise, and persuasive.

feature1.description: we know what works because we collaborate with investors daily.

feature2.title: more than design

feature3.title: tailored for climate-tech
feature3.description: we understand the specific challenges & opportunities of the industry.

steps.label: Application & first strategy session
list: defining your unique value proposition & competitive edge;
identifying key investment hooks that resonate with VCs and angels;
understanding your traction, growth story, and scalability.

steps.label: Crafting a narrative
list: based on the strategic input, we plan out or refine your pitch deck structure

steps.label: Clear design
list: minimal, focused & clear to read, on-brand design & visuals;

steps.label: Pitch delivery coaching
list: 1:1 pitch refining of the storytelling & delivery;
investor Q&A prep to help you answer tough questions with ease;
feedback & iteration based on real investor insights;.

steps.label: Investor positioning & fundraising support (optional)
steps.description: Beyond the pitch deck, we can help with:
list: identifying the right investors based on your stage & industry (Investor matchmaking)
making warm introductions to relevant VCs, angels, and funds
supporting with deal negotiation & closing (Deal closing & Legal support)

content.title: Investor psychology insights
content.description: We understand how investors think and we'll help you structure your pitch so it speaks directly to investor decision-making process.

content.title: Public speaking & pitching
content.description: Great ideas fail if they're not communicated well. We offer dedicated pitch coaching, public speaking training, and even technical sessions on structuring your slides. Whether it's handling tough investor questions or owning the stage, we'll help you deliver your pitch with clarity and confidence.

content.title: Exclusive meetups & hands-on workshops
content.description: We organize regular events focused on pitching & fundraising, where you can learn from top VCs, see real-life pitch deck breakdowns, and practice your delivery. These sessions are designed to help sharpen messaging and overcome common mistakes.

content.title: Professional-drade deck
content.description: A clear, data-driven, visually compelling, and professionally designed presentation that makes the message stand out.

schedule_call.text: Are you a founder looking to fundraise and in need of a winning deck? Schedule a free call and see how we can support you.
